```{r}
# load packages
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
# load data 
sea_ice_data <- read.csv("data/sea_ice.csv")

# Create dataframe
sea_ice_data <- data.frame(sea_ice_data)

# Format date column
sea_ice_data$Date <- mdy(sea_ice_data$Date)
```

```{r}
# Visualize sea ice data 

ggplot(data = sea_ice_data, aes(x = Date, y = Vol)) +
  geom_area(fill="lightblue", color="black") +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title = "PIOMAS Arctic Sea Ice Volume Anomaly (1979-2021)",
       x = "Date",
       y = "Sea Ice Volume (km^3)") +
  theme_classic()

```
